name: ilod_status_ilod_ticket_get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ifc_bim_services.
Tool description: IFC models related BIM services
GITHUB Repository : https://github.com/aminov-jp/BIMIFCServices
API description: Fetches the result of an ILOD (Industry Level of Development) check using a given ticket.

ticket.description: The ticket identifier for the ILOD check.
